titleStmt.title: Nehemiah the Tirshatha, or, The character of a good commissioner to which is added Grapes in the wilderness / by Mr. Thomas Bell ...
titleStmt.author: Bell, Thomas, fl. 1672-1692.
Bell, Thomas. Grapes in the wilderness.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Mosman, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: "Grapes in the wilderness" has special t.p., separate paging, and continuous register. Formerly Wing B1803 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd.ed.)
Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
